CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 按；压；压平；挤压；熨平；熨烫；推；榨取；把…榨汁；强调；坚持；坚持要求；紧迫；紧迫地（干某事）；逼迫；迫使；催促；强迫使用；施加压力；逼迫行动；（向…）拥挤；推搡着移动；将…塞进
挤压；报道；评论；出版社；记者；新闻工作者；新闻界；报刊；印刷媒体；报章杂志；印刷机；（分层）大壁橱；衣柜；书柜；碗柜；拥挤的人群（或大批事物）；压平机；（Press）普雷斯（男子名）

synonym.mean: 压；按；新闻；出版社；印刷机

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 增压；密封；使…加压（pressurize的过去式）
加压的；有使血压增高的；收缩血管的
密封；增压；使……加压，使……压入

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指把某些东西压在一起或使占有较小空间。
普通用词，指一个物体在另一个物体上加压力。
多指从两面或多面施加压力来压紧、压碎或压出水来。
指某物受力被压偏或压碎。也指塞挤。
专指四面八方都压紧或塞满。
本义为“日报”，现在可指定期发生的周刊、月刊、季刊等或指学术团体出版的刊物、杂志或学报。
指刊登各种文章、小说、诗歌、评议的杂志。
系报刊总称，也指报界或报业。
通常指除日报以外的定期出版刊物。
多指登载评论性文章或讨论重大事件的文章的刊物。
一般指每日出版的报纸。

word_group.brief_definition: 按压, 强加于；向前推进
热压机；夹板压制机；晾衣柜

bilingual.source: If you press this button, the computer starts.
bilingual.target: 如果你按下这个按钮，电脑就会启动。

bilingual.source: Somehow, I forced my finger to press the button.
bilingual.target: 不知怎么的，我强迫自己按下了按钮。

bilingual.source: Presently I am going to press the lever, and off the machine will go.
bilingual.target: 现在我要按下杠杆，机器就会启动。

bilingual.source: Please press the button to power on.
Press the keycode to unlock the door.
Press the ped to accelerate the car.

list.abstract: press（[pres]），英语单词，作动词为压；榨；挤。作名词为压平机；榨汁机；压榨机。短语搭配有printing press（印刷机）。例句为“Wood is working with the New World Press.（伍德正在与新世界出版社合作。）” press及物动词类近义词有push、hug等。名词类clic、news bulletin。复数为presses。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I'll press 1.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我按一键。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I press the button? I think it's George's turn. Press the top button, George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能按这个按钮吗？这次该轮到乔治了，按最上面的按钮，乔治。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I press the button? I think it's George's turn. Press the top button, George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能按这个按钮吗？这次该轮到乔治了，按最上面的按钮，乔治。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, that was beautiful. If you didn't press record. I pressed it!
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿刚才那段话太感人了，如果你没有按下录制…老娘按了！

yingyinNormal.en: Press this button and it just disappears. And if you push this button, you can play CDs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 按下这个按钮然后他就消失了。哦。啊。然后你们按下这个按钮就可以播放唱片了。

yingyinNormal.en: Press this button and it just disappears. Oh. Ah. And if you push this button, you can play CDs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 按下这个按钮然后他就消失了。哦。啊。然后你们按下这个按钮就可以播放唱片了。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't press any of the buttons with my gloves. Oh, son of a bitch!
yingyinNormal.zh: 带着手套，我按不了按键，冻死我了！

yingyinNormal.en: That's brothers for you. They always know which buttons to press.
yingyinNormal.zh: 兄弟就是这样的，他们总是知道该按哪个按钮。

yingyinNormal.en: 233 if we include the one somebody forgot to press record on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果某人有次没忘了按下录制键，那应该是233集。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I press the button too? Of course, Peppa. Yes? It's me. Hello me. Come in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也能按这个按钮吗？当然可以，佩奇。哪位？是我呀。你好呀，我。请进

yingyinNormal.en: Can I press the button too? Of course, Peppa. Yes? It's me. Hello me. Come in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也能按这个按钮吗？当然可以，佩奇。哪位？是我呀。你好呀，我。请进。

yingyinNormal.en: So I want to buy it now, and how to buy it? We just press "buy" and the face recognition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想现在买下它，如何买呢？我们仅需按下“购买”键，通过人脸识别系统。

yingyinNormal.en: The best thing it does is "Happy Mrs. Chicken". When you press this button, she lays an egg.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最棒的一点是可以用它来玩“快乐小鸡”的游戏。当你按下这个按钮，它就会下一个蛋。

yingyinNormal.en: The best thing it does is "Happy Mrs. Chicken". When you press this button, she lays an egg.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最棒的一点是可以用它来玩“快乐小鸡”的游戏。当你按下这个按钮，它就会下一个蛋。

yingyinNormal.en: What the nurse is like? They give me stickers. Wow. And they come whenever I press this button.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里的护士怎么样？他们还送给我贴纸呢。他们会马上来，只要我按下这个按钮就行了。

yingyinNormal.en: Please press the blue button. The camper van is driving into the river. Our camper van has turned into a boat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请按下蓝色的按钮。露营车就这样开到了河里。我们的露营车现在变成了一艘船。

yingyinNormal.en: On Suzy's camera, you just press this button to stop it talking. Thank you for purchasing… Now it won't talk anymore.
yingyinNormal.zh: 苏西家的摄像机，你按这个按钮它就不会说话了。谢谢你购买...现在，他不说话啦。

yingyinNormal.en: On Suzy's camera, you just press this button to stop it talking. Thank you for purchasing… Now it won't talk anymore.
yingyinNormal.zh: 苏西家的摄像机，你按这个按钮它就不会说话了。谢谢你购买...现在，他不说话啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen up. Unlatch the portafilter from the group head. Press here for an ounce of grounds. Tamp it in, pack it down, turn it on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听好，从冲煮头下拿出滤勺，按下按钮 会出来一盎司的咖啡粉，塞进去，压紧，开机。

yingyinNormal.en: And your God does not mind? No. All you have to do is touch a sensor. Press here. Really? Yes, and the message just pop. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的神灵也不介意吗？不会的，你只要碰一下那感应器就行了。按一下这里。不是吧。是的，结果出来了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 新闻舆论; 报刊评论
催促; 敦促; 逼迫

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；迫切的；恳切的；急切的；热切的
n. 压力；压迫；影响；压强；压迫感；影响力

word_family.mean: v. 压；榨；挤；压平；熨平；竭力要求；坚持；强调；征用；临时使用

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 坚决继续；继续前进；加紧

examination_example.sentence: The infrastructure required to make a physical newspaper — printing <highlight>presses</highlight>, delivery trucks — isn't just expensive; it's excessive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制作一份实体报纸所需的基础设施——印刷机、运输卡车——不仅昂贵；而且是过度的。

examination_example.sentence: The second half of the 20th century saw a collection of geniuses labour to create a fabulous machine that could function as a printing <highlight>press</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 20世纪下半叶，一群天才竭力创造了一台可作为印刷机使用的神奇机器。

examination_example.sentence: Dickens and his publishers simply <highlight>pressed</highlight> on with a new artist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狄更斯和出版商直接换了一个新的艺术家继续工作。

examination_example.sentence: Unable to tell whether someone really objects to behavioural ads or whether they are sticking with Microsoft's default, some may <highlight>press</highlight> on anyway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于无法分辨用户是真的反对行为广告，还是他们没有改动微软的默认设置，一些企业可能还是会继续追踪。

sense_info_list.zh: 新闻舆论; 报刊评论

examination_example.sentence: The really successful holders of such titles are those that bring in high-profile arts events and good <highlight>press</highlight> for a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些头衔的获得者中真正成功的，是那些在一年内带来高知名度艺术活动和高质量新闻报道的人。

examination_example.sentence: There is a great deal of this kind of nonsense in the medical journals which, when taken up by the lay <highlight>press</highlight>, generates health scares.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医学期刊上有很多这样的无稽之谈，当被非专业媒体报道时，会引起健康恐慌。

sense_info_list.en: make strong efforts to persuade or force someone to do or provide something
sense_info_list.zh: 催促; 敦促; 逼迫

examination_example.sentence: By pointing out identity “citizens”, the author indicates that we should <highlight>press</highlight> our government to lead the combat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者通过指出“公民”的身份，表明我们应该敦促政府来领导这场战斗。

examination_example.sentence: Next, the researchers trapped the robots in cages and gave the rats the opportunity to release them by <highlight>pressing</highlight> a lever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接下来，研究人员将机器老鼠困在笼子里，让老鼠有机会通过按压杠杆释放机器鼠。

examination_example.sentence: When our time of mourning is over, we <highlight>press</highlight> forward, stronger with a greater understanding and respect for life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们的哀悼时间结束时，我们继续前进，带着对生命更多的理解和尊重，变得更加强大。

sense_info_list.en: forcefully put forward an opinion, claim, or course of action

word_usage.usage:
press, journal, periodical, review都表示“期刊”。                                                                                             
press指报刊，也指新闻界。
journal指(学科或专业的)报纸或期刊。
periodical指(学术)期刊。
review指(时事、艺术等的)评论刊物。
press表“报界; 新闻界”时，要与定冠词the连用。注意the press作主语时，其谓语动词既可用单数也可用复数形式。
press作不及物动词时，常与ahead或for连用。press ahead表示“加紧; 匆忙前进”，而press for表示“敦促; 竭力劝说”。

press作“压; 按; 熨”时，只用作单数名词，常与a连用。
示例：These clothes could do with a press.
这些衣服熨一下就行了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 出版社; 印刷厂; 媒体
(the ~)新闻界; 新闻工作者; 记者

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；迫切的；恳切的；急切的；热切的
n. 压力；压迫；影响；压强；压迫感；影响力

word_family.mean: v. 压；榨；挤；压平；熨平；竭力要求；坚持；强调；征用；临时使用

examination_example.sentence: "And yet that happens every day in the video game world," Farley told reporters during a <highlight>press</highlight> conference Friday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法利在周五的新闻发布会上告诉记者：“但在电子游戏世界里，这种情况每天都在发生。”

examination_example.sentence: It had more than a hundred printing <highlight>presses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它有一百多台印刷机。

examination_example.sentence: It was in Germany around the year 1450 that a printing <highlight>press</highlight> used using movable metal type was invented.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约在1450年，德国发明了一种使用金属活字的印刷机。

examination_example.sentence: The biggest sixteenth-century printer, Plantin of Antwerp, had 24 printing <highlight>presses</highlight> and employed more than a hundred workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 十六世纪最大的印刷商，安特卫普的普兰丁，拥有24台印刷机，雇佣了一百多名工人。

sense_info_list.en: the judgment that is given of someone or something in the newspapers or on radio or television

examination_example.sentence: "And yet that happens every day in the video game world." Farley told reporters during a <highlight>press</highlight> conference Friday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在周五的新闻发布会上 Farley 对记者说: “然而这在电子游戏世界中每天都在发生。”

examination_example.sentence: There had been numerous alarming articles in the <highlight>press</highlight> about a climate catastrophe waiting to happen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于即将发生的气候灾难，媒体上有许多令人担忧的文章。

examination_example.sentence: Even the technology <highlight>press</highlight> conferences have a different bent to them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使是技术新闻发布会也有不同的倾向。

examination_example.sentence: It opened its fourth station last year and is <highlight>pressing</highlight> ahead with plans to build a fifth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它去年开放了第四个基地，并正在推进第五个基地的建设计划。

examination_example.sentence: Nations are also <highlight>pressing</highlight> ahead with space research and satellite projects to expand their global navigation abilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 各国还在推进空间研究和卫星项目，以扩大其全球导航能力。

sense_info_list.en: make strong efforts to persuade or force someone to do or provide something

examination_example.sentence: Civilian aviation is being disrupted, by the <highlight>pressing</highlight> need to respond to a changing climate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 民航正在受到干扰，因为人们迫切需要对变化的气候做出反应。

sense_info_list.en: forcefully put forward an opinion, claim, or course of action
a business that prints and produces books and similar things
sense_info_list.zh: 出版社; 印刷厂; 媒体

sense_info_list.en: make clothes smooth by ironing them

examination_example.sentence: Ease of care was most important; summer dresses and outfits, in particular, were chiefly cotton, readily capable of being washed and <highlight>pressed</highlight> at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 易于护理是最重要的; 特别是夏天的裙子和套装都主要是棉布制成的，很容易在家里洗和熨。

examination_example.sentence: As Nature went to <highlight>press</highlight>, the Australian government had not responded to specific criticisms of the plan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 截至《自然》杂志付印时，澳大利亚政府尚未对该计划的具体批评作出回应。

examination_example.sentence: During commercials, prompting viewers to <highlight>press</highlight> a button to request a free sample or order a catalogue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在广告期间，鼓励观众按下按钮要求免费样品或订购目录。

sense_info_list.zh: (the ~)新闻界; 新闻工作者; 记者

exam_freq_info.chinese: 出版社; 印刷厂; 媒体

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；迫切的；恳切的；急切的；热切的
vt. 密封；对…施加压力；增压；（pressurize的过去式）
n. 压力；压迫；影响；压强；压迫感；影响力

word_family.mean: v. 压；榨；挤；压平；熨平；竭力要求；坚持；强调；征用；临时使用

sense_info_list.en: the judgment that is given of someone or something in the newspapers or on radio or television

examination_example.sentence: "Cats use a causal-logical understanding of noise or sounds to predict the appearance of invisible objects," lead researcher Saho Takagi says in a <highlight>press</highlight> release.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首席研究员 Saho Takagi 在一份新闻稿中说：“猫利用对噪音或声音的因果逻辑理解来预测看不见的物体的出现。”

examination_example.sentence: As I was considering all this, a <highlight>press</highlight> release from a respected research firm crossed my desk.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在我考虑这一切的时候，一份来自一家受人尊敬的研究公司的新闻稿掠过我的办公桌。

sense_info_list.en: forcefully put forward an opinion; claim; or course of action

examination_example.sentence: Finally, the FBI received a tip that the stolen document was located very close to Washington, D. C. Their art crime team recovered the letter but were unable to <highlight>press</highlight> charges because the time of limitations had ended.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，联邦调查局(FBI)收到线索，被盗文件的位置离华盛顿特区非常近。他们的艺术犯罪小组找回了这封信，但由于诉讼时效已经结束，无法提出指控。

sense_info_list.en: make strong efforts to persuade or force someone to do or provide something
a business that prints and produces books and similar things
sense_info_list.zh: 出版社; 印刷厂; 媒体

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 压力；压迫；影响；压强；压迫感；影响力

word_family.mean: v. 压；榨；挤；压平；熨平；竭力要求；坚持；强调；征用；临时使用

examination_example.sentence: The keyboard could offer a strong layer of security by analyzing the force of a user's typing and the time between key <highlight>presses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过分析用户打字的力度和按键之间的时间间隔，键盘可以提供一层强大的保护层。

examination_example.sentence: The WHO-China Joint Mission on Covid-19 held a <highlight>press</highlight> conference.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世卫组织-中国新冠肺炎联合代表团举行了新闻发布会。

examination_example.sentence: The WHO-China Joint Mission on Covid-19 held a <highlight>press</highlight> conference inBeijing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世卫组织-中国新冠肺炎联合代表团在北京举行了新闻发布会。

examination_example.sentence: When she reached one nurse, she tried to <highlight>press</highlight> a five-pound note into her hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当她找到一位护士时，她试图把一张五英镑的钞票塞进她的手里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；迫切的；恳切的；急切的；热切的
n. 压力；压迫；影响；压强；压迫感；影响力

word_family.mean: v. 压；榨；挤；压平；熨平；竭力要求；坚持；强调；征用；临时使用

examination_example.sentence: Some kids <highlight>press</highlight> down really hard when they write.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些孩子在写作时非常用力。

examination_example.sentence: When you <highlight>press</highlight> your ear, the nerves in your throat can feel it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你按住耳朵时，喉咙里的神经能感觉到。

examination_example.sentence: If your throat tickles (发痒), <highlight>pressing</highlight> your ear might make it go away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的喉咙发痒，按压耳朵可能会得到缓解。。

examination_example.sentence: The printer uses huge printing <highlight>presses</highlight> to make the pages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 印刷厂使用巨大的印刷机来制作这些页面。

examination_example.sentence: But the biggest change for books in Europe came in 1439, when Johannes Gutenberg invented the printing <highlight>press</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但欧洲书籍最大的变化出现在1439年，约翰内斯·古腾堡发明了印刷机。

examination_example.sentence: Many more people could afford the books that were produced on a printing <highlight>press</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更多的人可以买得起用印刷机印刷的书籍。

examination_example.sentence: Wood is working with the New World <highlight>Press</highlight>, which plans to make his diaries a book named The Invisible War.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伍德正在与新世界出版社合作，该出版社计划把他的日记写成一本书，名为《看不见的战争》。

examination_example.sentence: People’s Education <highlight>Press</highlight>（出版社）in China helped a local <highlight>press</highlight> make them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国的人民教育出版社帮助当地的一家媒体制作了它们。

examination_example.sentence: Bock employs 40 people, and using his special methods of steam and <highlight>press</highlight> machines, he has recycled 32 million pairs of chopsticks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 博克雇佣了40名员工，利用蒸汽机和压力机的特殊方法，他回收了3200万双筷子。
